content: Meeting preferences: Any busy public place, busy car parking spot, petrol station, etc. Hi, Thank you for opening my advert.Meeting place will be mutually decided.I am local to Amsterdam.I reserve the right to cancel anytime if i suspect fraudulent behaviour.Price will be decided at the time of meet-up.WhatsApp/Viber/Telegram/Call/SMS:+14302982213no deals outside of Amsterdam or the Netherlands Â ,

comments.author: blockman
comments.body: If you're from Nederlands, try to find a contact of your other local members through your own local section.Nederlands (Dutch) (https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?board=79.0)Find someone who may be able to do that for you from there. But instead of doing this meet-up, try to find some other P2P marketplace that suits you, I'm searching through your country but it seems it's a mix and I have no idea if they'll work for you. Well, the lists can easily be googled.
